#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int n,res=0,x,y,z;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        if(n<=2)
        {
            cout<<n<<"\n";
        }
        else if(n%6==0)
        {

            printf("%lld\n",(n-1)*(n-2)*(n-3));
        }
        else if(n%2!=0)
        {
            printf("%lld\n",n*(n-1)*(n-2));
        }
        else
        {
            printf("%lld\n",n*(n-1)*(n-3));
        }
    }
}
